name: [ balloon killer ]
description:
You pissed off the balloons.
 Now they're trying to kill you. Kill them first.

A score attack FPS where you protect yourself from pissed off balloons. This was a game made across two evenings, and turned out surprisingly fine for what it is. There are no sound effects or music, so it is recommended to listen to music or something else while playing. Go ahead and share your high score in the comments with a screenshot if you enjoy it.

CONTROLS:

W and S / Joystick Up and Down - Move Forward and Backward

A and D / Joystick Left and Right - Rotate Character

Space / Bottom Face Button - Shoot

R / Right Shoulder Button - Restart

Escape / Start Button - Pause

Backspace / Select Button - Quit Game

DEVELOPED BY FREE FOOD STUDIOS
